description:
VLI Tech is pleased to present a mobile supported application designed specifically for the EMS field manager.  EMS Anyware Mobile places, at your fingertips, full wireless access to real time data residing on your dispatching system via the EMS Anyware Information Server, also provided by VLI Tech .  EMS Anyware Mobile instantaneously extracts data as you need it so you can more efficiently manage and track your staff and services.  Following is a brief list of the features of the EMS Anyware Mobile application:

Provides field managers with mission critical information from "Anyware"
- Summary Analytics that help you to decide what needs attention or where your problem areas may be.
- Active Units allows you to see all the units currently in the field, where they are, which crew is assigned, and what trips they have taken during the current shift.  Many Statuses will be color coded using the same colors you have set up in your dispatching system.
- Open Work allows you to view all of your open work items that are scheduled within the next 24hrs.
- People allows you to view all of your crew members and their information stored in the dispatching system.  EMS Anyware Mobile will compute their hours worked in the current work week based on the trips they have been assigned, allowing you resource load work and manage overtime.

Real time mapping of active units in the field against current trip information using the MapQuest engine.

Filters which allow you to view only specific companies or dispatch zones defined in your system.

For a demo, use the following default server information:
Server: emsanyware.com
SSL: (uncheck)
Path: demo
Port: (leave blank)
Username: demo
Domain: (leave blank)
Password: demo
versionNote: Corrected incorrect field label on password box at login.
